# Steelhead Eyes and Ears
Dissertation Ch. 1

## Project Overview

This project includes data analysis for eye lenses and otoliths from hatchery caught steelhead (O. mykiss) from 2021, 2022 and 2024, in an attempt to understand the food web and migration dynamics most contributing to thiamine deficiency complex in California steelhead.

---
